title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: As a security-conscious user, I want to enable two-factor authentication on my account so that my account remains secure even if my password is compromised.
acceptance_criteria: User can enable/disable MFA from account settings
System supports SMS and authenticator app-based MFA
User receives setup instructions with QR code for authenticator apps
System allows backup codes for account recovery
Failed MFA attempts are logged for security monitoring
User can choose to 'trust this device' for 30 days

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Implemented SMS-based MFA. Working on authenticator app integration.

comments.author: Security Auditor
comments.text: Ensure rate limiting on MFA attempts to prevent brute force attacks.
